page.title: 09ROUNDERS
page.content: Rounders is a game where you need two equal teams, one small ball and bases. Toss a coin to see who bowls first. The opposing team spreads out round the playing area. The bowler throws the ball and you catch it. You throw it as far as you can and run round the bases. If the bowler gets the ball while you are at a base you have to stop. If you are between two bases and the bowler gets the ball, you are 'out'. If you get round all the bases you get a 'ROUNDER'. If the person throws the ball and the other team catches it your team is out and the other team is in. The winner is the team with the most rounders.
